Name: Discretionary Supplement
Title: "Discretionary Supplement" Dori
Desc: "First raise the price by 30%, then sell at a 20% discount!"
Source: Reward for inviting Dori to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Discretionary Supplement
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1410]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1410] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S14103]</color> once.
The <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C114102]</color> summoned by your $[A1410] who has this card equipped heals 1 more HP when healing characters with no more than 6 HP, and increases the amount of $[K310] gained by characters with no $[K310] by 1 when $[K310] is gained.
(You must have $[A1410] in your deck to add this card to your deck)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C114102.Name: Jinni
C114102.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>End Phase:</color> Heal your active character for 2 HP and that character gains 1 $[K310].\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K3]: 2</color>

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.

K3.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage(s)</color>
K3.Desc: After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Usages</color> remaining.

K310.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy</color>
K310.Desc: Characters must consume {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy to use their Elemental Bursts.\nWhen characters use an Elemental Skill or a Normal Attack, they will gain 1 {SPRITE_PRESET#1110}Energy.
